description: This file contains an implementation of AES-based SIV (Synthetic Initialization Vector) authenticated encryption mode, including functions for CMAC, S2V (Synthetic IV generation), and CTR mode encryption/decryption. It defines the cryptographic logic and helper functions for AES-SIV operations.

methods.name: void xor(unsigned char * output,const unsigned char * input)
methods.description: Performs bitwise XOR on two blocks of bytes.

methods.name: void times_two(unsigned char * output,unsigned char * input)
methods.description: Computes polynomial multiplication of input by 2 modulo the AES polynomial.

methods.name: void pad(unsigned char * buf,int len)
methods.description: Pads a buffer with 0x80 followed by zeros to reach AES_BLOCK_SIZE.

methods.name: void aes_cmac(siv_ctx * ctx,const unsigned char * msg,int mlen,unsigned char * C)
methods.description: Computes AESCMAC (message authentication code) on a message.

methods.name: int s2v_final(siv_ctx * ctx,const unsigned char * X,int xlen,unsigned char * digest)
methods.description: Computes the final S2V digest based on input data.

methods.name: void s2v_add(siv_ctx * ctx,const unsigned char * Y)
methods.description: Adds an SPRF-digested string to the S2V T value.

methods.name: void s2v_update(siv_ctx * ctx,const unsigned char * X,int xlen)
methods.description: Updates the S2V T value with raw data.

methods.name: int siv_init(siv_ctx * ctx,const unsigned char * key,int keylen)
methods.description: Initializes an SIV context with a given key.

methods.name: void siv_restart(siv_ctx * ctx)
methods.description: Resets certain parts of the SIV context, keeping keying material.

methods.name: void s2v_benchmark(siv_ctx * ctx)
methods.description: Saves the current T state for optimization.

methods.name: void s2v_reset(siv_ctx * ctx)
methods.description: Restores the saved benchmarked T state.

methods.name: void siv_aes_ctr(siv_ctx * ctx,const unsigned char * p,const int lenp,unsigned char * c,const unsigned char * iv)
methods.description: Performs AES encryption/decryption in CTR mode using the SIV context and IV.

methods.name: int siv_encrypt(siv_ctx * ctx,const unsigned char * p,unsigned char * c,const int len,unsigned char * counter,const int nad,...)
methods.description: Performs S2V derivation, followed by CTR mode encryption of plaintext.

methods.name: int siv_decrypt(siv_ctx * ctx,const unsigned char * c,unsigned char * p,const int len,unsigned char * counter,const int nad,...)
methods.description: Performs CTR mode decryption, then verifies integrity with S2V.

ctags.name: aes_cmac
ctags.pattern: /^aes_cmac (siv_ctx *ctx, const unsigned char *msg, int mlen, unsigned char *C)$/
ctags.signature: (siv_ctx * ctx,const unsigned char * msg,int mlen,unsigned char * C)

ctags.name: s2v_final
ctags.pattern: /^s2v_final (siv_ctx *ctx, const unsigned char *X, int xlen, unsigned char *digest)$/
ctags.signature: (siv_ctx * ctx,const unsigned char * X,int xlen,unsigned char * digest)

ctags.name: siv_aes_ctr
ctags.pattern: /^siv_aes_ctr (siv_ctx *ctx, const unsigned char *p, const int lenp,$/
ctags.signature: (siv_ctx * ctx,const unsigned char * p,const int lenp,unsigned char * c,const unsigned char * iv)

ctags.name: siv_decrypt
ctags.signature: (siv_ctx * ctx,const unsigned char * c,unsigned char * p,const int len,unsigned char * counter,const int nad,...)

ctags.name: siv_encrypt
ctags.signature: (siv_ctx * ctx,const unsigned char * p,unsigned char * c,const int len,unsigned char * counter,const int nad,...)
